error.message: Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Controller\ControllerBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Most of the time static::entityTypeManager() is supposed to be used instead.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityBase. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\menu_link_config\Plugin\Derivative\MenuLinkConfig::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.

Parameter $alias_manager of method Drupal\menu_link_config\Plugin\Menu\Form\MenuLinkConfigForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Path\AliasManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.8.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\path_alias\AliasManagerInterface.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\menu_link_config\Plugin\Menu\Form\MenuLinkConfigForm::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Parameter $entity_manager of method Drupal\menu_link_config\Plugin\Menu\MenuLinkConfig::__construct() has typehint with deprecated interface Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManagerInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0.
Call to deprecated method urlInfo() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityInterface::toUrl() instead.
Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to menu_link_config.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
A drupal/core requirement is not present in composer.json. Having a composer.json is not a requirement for Drupal 9 compatibility but if there is one, it should include a drupal/core requirement.
